mapper.select:
/*WELLS - 월별 재지급 관리 목록조회 ( 판매자별 )*/ SELECT M.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM /*발생년월*/ , M.PERF_YM /*실적년월*/ , A.OG_CD /*소속코드*/ , MAX(M.PRTNR_NO) AS PRTNR_NO /*파트너번호*/ , A.PRTNR_KNM /*성명*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'DDTN_RPLC_WELLS_PSTN_DV_CD', A.PSTN_DV_CD, #{session.langId}) AS RSB_DV_NM /*직책명*/ , SUBSTR(A.CLTN_DT, 1, 6) AS CLTN_YM /*해약년월*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'REDF_ADSB_DV_CD', M.REDF_ADSB_DV_CD, #{session.langId}) AS REDF_ADSB_DV_NM /*지급구분*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN M.PERF_DV_CD = '0' THEN (CASE WHEN M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT, 0) ELSE NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_OC_AMT, 0) END) END), 0) AS PR_ADSB_AMT /*개인 재지급액*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN M.PERF_DV_CD = '2' THEN (CASE WHEN M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT, 0) ELSE NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_OC_AMT, 0) END) END), 0) AS OG_ADSB_AMT /*조직 재지급액*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT, 0) ELSE NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_OC_AMT, 0) END) , 0) AS SUM_ADSB_AMT /*재지급액계*/ FROM TB_FEDD_FEE_REDF_ADSB_BAS M /*수수료되물림재지급기본*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ A /*월파트너내역*/ ON M.PRTNR_NO = A.PRTNR_NO AND M.OG_TP_CD = A.OG_TP_CD AND M.PERF_YM = A.BASE_YM /*실적년월 = 월파트너기준년월*/ WHERE M.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*재지급 고정, TODO: 재지급 데이터 없어서 현재 주석처리*/
AND M.OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} /*PARAM: 조직유형*/
AND A.BZ_STAT_CD = (CASE WHEN #{cltnYn} = '5' THEN '2' WHEN #{cltnYn} = '6' THEN '1' END) /*PARAM: 해약여부, 1: 재직, 2: 해약*/
AND M.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM = #{redfAdsbOcYm} /*PARAM: 발생년월*/
AND M.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} /*PARAM: 파트너번호*/
AND M.PERF_DV_CD = (CASE WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '15' THEN '0' WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '10' THEN '1' WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '7' THEN '2' WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '4' THEN '5' WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '2' THEN '7' END) /*PARAM: 직급구분 (개인: 0, 지구: 1, 지점: 2, 지역: 5, 총괄: 7) (pstnDvCd, 15: 웰스플래너, 10: 지구장, 7: 지점장, 4: 지역단장, 2: 총괄단장)*/
GROUP BY M.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM, M.PERF_YM, A.OG_CD, A.PRTNR_KNM, A.PSTN_DV_CD , A.CLTN_DT, M.REDF_ADSB_DV_CD

/*WELLS - 월별 재지급 관리 목록조회 ( 계약별 )*/ WITH SELL_ADSB AS ( SELECT SUM(NVL(CASE WHEN M.PERF_DV_CD = '0' OR M.PERF_DV_CD = '1' THEN NVL(CASE WHEN M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT, 0) ELSE NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_OC_AMT, 0) END, 0) END, 0)) AS SELL_PRTNR_ADSB_AMT /*판매자 재지급액*/ , A1.SELL_PRTNR_NO AS PRTNR_NO , B.PRTNR_KNM , A1.SELL_OG_TP_CD AS OG_TP_CD , SUBSTR(A2.CNTR_PD_STRTDT, 1, 8) AS PERF_DT , M.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM , M.PERF_YM , B.OG_ID , B.OG_CD , M.CNTR_NO , M.CNTR_SN , SUBSTR(M.FST_RGST_DTM, 1, 8) AS OC_DT FROM TB_FEDD_FEE_REDF_ADSB_DTL M /*수수료되물림재지급상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS A1 /*계약기본*/ ON M.PRTNR_NO = A1.SELL_PRTNR_NO AND M.OG_TP_CD = A1.SELL_OG_TP_CD AND M.CNTR_NO = A1.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL A2 /*계약상세*/ ON M.CNTR_NO = A2.CNTR_NO AND M.CNTR_SN = A2.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ B ON M.PERF_YM = B.BASE_YM AND M.PRTNR_NO = B.PRTNR_NO AND M.OG_TP_CD = B.OG_TP_CD WHERE M.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND M.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM = #{redfAdsbOcYm} /*PARAM: 발생년월*/
AND M.OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} /*PARAM: 조직유형*/
AND M.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} /*PARAM: 파트너번호*/
AND B.BZ_STAT_CD = '2' /*PARAM: 해약여부, 1:사업 3:휴업, 2: 해약*/
AND B.BZ_STAT_CD IN ('1', '3') /*PARAM: 해약여부, 1:사업 3:휴업, 2: 해약*/
AND M.PERF_DV_CD = (CASE WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '15' THEN '0' WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '10' THEN '1' WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '7' THEN '2' WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '4' THEN '5' WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '2' THEN '7' END) /*PARAM: 직급구분 (개인: 0, 지구: 1, 지점: 2, 지역: 5, 총괄: 7) (pstnDvCd, 15: 웰스플래너, 10: 지구장, 7: 지점장, 4: 지역단장, 2: 총괄단장)*/
GROUP BY A1.SELL_PRTNR_NO, A1.SELL_OG_TP_CD, B.PRTNR_KNM, A2.CNTR_PD_STRTDT, M.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM , B.OG_ID, B.OG_CD, M.CNTR_NO, M.CNTR_SN , M.FST_RGST_DTM, M.PERF_YM ) , BRCH_ADSB AS ( SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN M.PERF_DV_CD = '2' THEN NVL(CASE WHEN M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT, 0) ELSE NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_OC_AMT, 0) END, 0) END), 0) AS BRCH_ADSB_AMT /*지점전체의 재지급액*/ , T1.OG_CD AS OG_CD , T1.OG_ID AS OG_ID , T1.PRTNR_KNM AS BRCH_PRTNR_KNM , T1.PRTNR_NO AS BRCH_PRTNR_NO , T1.OG_TP_CD , M.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM , M.PERF_YM FROM TB_FEDD_FEE_REDF_ADSB_DTL M /*수수료되물림재지급상세*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ A ON M.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM = A.BASE_YM AND M.PRTNR_NO = A.PRTNR_NO AND M.OG_TP_CD = A.OG_TP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.BASE_YM , A.OG_TP_CD , A.PRTNR_NO , A.PRTNR_KNM , A.OG_ID , A.OG_CD , A.OG_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ A /*월파트너내역*/ WHERE A.PSTN_DV_CD = '7' /*지점장*/ AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) T1 ON M.PERF_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND A.OG_ID = T1.OG_ID AND A.OG_CD = T1.OG_CD WHERE M.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND M.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM = #{redfAdsbOcYm} /*PARAM: 발생년월*/ GROUP BY M.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM, T1.OG_CD, T1.OG_ID, M.PERF_YM, T1.PRTNR_NO, T1.PRTNR_KNM, T1.OG_TP_CD ) SELECT S.OC_DT /*처리일자*/ , S.PERF_DT /*귀속일자*/ , S.CNTR_NO , S.CNTR_SN , S.CNTR_NO || S.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_NO_SN , S.PRTNR_NO , S.PRTNR_KNM , NVL(S.SELL_PRTNR_ADSB_AMT, 0) AS SELL_PRTNR_ADSB_AMT , S.OG_ID , S.OG_CD , S1.BRCH_PRTNR_NO , S1.BRCH_PRTNR_KNM , NVL(S1.BRCH_ADSB_AMT, 0) AS BRCH_ADSB_AMT FROM SELL_ADSB S INNER JOIN BRCH_ADSB S1 ON S.OG_ID = S1.OG_ID AND S.OG_CD = S1.OG_CD AND S.OG_TP_CD = S1.OG_TP_CD AND S.PERF_YM = S1.PERF_YM AND S.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM = S1.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM ORDER BY S.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM, S.PERF_DT, S.PRTNR_NO /* 조회결과: 발생년월-실적년월-소속코드-번호 오름차순으로 노출(설계서 반영) */
